SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Form 990 is reviewed by the Director of Accounting and is available forreview upon request by any board member.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Governance Committee reviews the policy at least annually. If there are instances where Board members are involved in SHO business (rarely), the Governance Committee reviews activities to assure there are no conflicts of interest. Findings can be reported to the Board.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15a: Compensation Review & Approval Process - CEO, Top Management
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A board member works for an executive search firm and has ready access tocomparable data.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Governing documents are available on Secretary of State's website; conflictof interest policy and financials are available upon request.
